New Records: De'Aaron Fox becomes the fifth player in Kings’ franchise history to eclipse 10,000 career points
De'Aaron Fox moves to the 2nd most steals in the Sacramento Kings history with 671 career steals
Key Match Events: The Kings held the Jazz to 14 third-quarter points en route to their first 15+ point win
Domantas Sabonis finished with a game-high 28 points, 11 rebounds, and four assists
Jordan Clarkson’s 21 points led the Jazz
Post-Match Reflections: De’Aaron Fox talked about playing with desperation after the Kings’ 0-2 start to the regular season
Others: Josue Pavon is an Associate Editor and the Oklahoma City Thunder beat writer for ClutchPoints
The article mentions that Fox is off to having another productive campaign and remains the No. 1 option on offense ahead of Sabonis and DeRozan
